content: learn how to create this lily the cat amigurumi with this free cat crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about an hour you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini cat from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger cat from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute cat amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-cat-crochet-pattern/ link to video https //youtu be/-apvyhh-1is
